interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers Review Date: 2020/12/09 Store: LOLYSENTA Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} Review Text: This is the new fashion trend and I am happy
I got on board work it lol. The rose quartz feels cold to the touch of your skin proving the skin with a fresh clean feeling after applying your moisturizer. The spike roller is for after washing your face. Very nice combo on selling both of them together. Review Title: Both very beautiful Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong preference for high-quality hair products and cosmetics that enhance aesthetics, such as dramatic-effect mascara. Recently expressed an interest in beauty tools that align with current trends, indicating a willingness to explore products that offer both functionality and a pleasing aesthetic.
  
- **Value for Money:** Discontent with overpriced products that do not meet quality expectations; values transparency in pricing and product descriptions. The recent purchase reflects a shift toward considering trendy, effective beauty tools that provide a perceived value.

- **Experience with Vendors:** Skeptical of vendor integrity, especially regarding refund policies and customer service, preferring sellers who prioritize customer satisfaction. Positive experiences may encourage exploring new vendors while still maintaining caution.

- **Sentiment Towards Reviews:** Heavily relies on detailed reviews, particularly negative ones, to inform purchasing decisions, viewing them as more credible. However, the recent positive experience suggests growing openness to products that perform well and meet high standards.

- **Feedback and Resolution:** Expects effective resolutions from sellers when products do not meet expectations; likely to reject products resulting in dissatisfaction, leading to a potential search for alternatives.

- **Overall Attitude:** Disappointed with misleading quality claims; seeks honest recommendations and actively warns others about unreliable products. Recent positive engagement with a beauty tool indicates a gradually evolving perspective toward products that genuinely impress.
